title: The Highs and Lows of the Stephen King Renaissance
itunes:title: The Highs and Lows of the Stephen King Renaissance
description:
It's been five years since It hit theaters and conquered the box office, becoming the highest grossing horror film of all time and tipping off a new Stephen King renaissance across Hollywood. Today? The scene is dire: Blumhouse's Firestarter failed to ignite, while 'Salem's Lot has completely been vanquished from Warner Bros' schedule. So, what the hell happened? The Losers dial back the clock to that eventful September in 2017 and chart the highs and lows over the last half decade.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon
